comment.text: This translation key is used for the placeholder text "SearchByNameEmail" which is displayed as a hint in a search input field within the developer tools section of the Portal Settings page. It appears on a TextInput component and guides users to enter either a name or email address to perform a search.

usage.context:
<UserInputContainer>
 <UserInput ref={searchRef}>
 <TextInput
 scale
 onChange={onChangeAuthor}
 placeholder={t("SearchByNameEmail")}
 value={author}
 onFocus={openInviteInputPanel}
 isAutoFocussed
 onKeyDown={onKeyDown}
 tabIndex={5}

<UserInputContainer>
 <UserInput ref={searchRef}>
 <TextInput
 scale
 onChange={onChangeAuthor}
 placeholder={t("SearchByNameEmail")}
 value={author}
 onFocus={openInviteInputPanel}
 isAutoFocussed
 onKeyDown={onKeyDown}
 tabIndex={5}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Որոնել անունով կամ էլ․հասցեով' is not a perfect translation of 'Search by name or email'. While it conveys the general meaning, 'էլ․' is unnecessary and slightly awkward. The word 'հասցեով' should be 'էլեկտրոնային հասցեով' or 'համալսարանական հասցեով' to be more accurate depending on the context. Assuming email address is intended, 'էլեկտրոնային հասցեով' is more precise.
The ellipsis 'էլ․' is visually jarring and not standard in Armenian. It should be avoided.
The translation '名前または電子メールによる検索' is technically correct but could be more natural-sounding in Japanese. It literally translates to 'Search by name or email'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 名前またはメールアドレスで検索 (Namae mata wa meeru adoresu de kenkou)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Search by name or email" is more naturally translated as "Wyszukaj po nazwie lub adresie e-mail" in Polish. "Szukaj według nazwy użytkownika lub adresu e-mail" is technically correct but a bit verbose and less common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wyszukaj po nazwie lub adresie e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'නම හෝ විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනයෙන් සොයන්න' is a literal translation, but it doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'Search by name or email'. A more natural Sinhala phrasing would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'නම ataupun විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනය භාවිතා කොට සොයන්න' or 'නම හෝ විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනය ඇසුරින් සොයන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses "емаил-у" which is a less common and slightly awkward construction. The more natural and standard term is "е-маил".
